EmailTemplate.name: Product Delivered - Social Post_Testimonials_TEAM
EmailTemplate.subject: Your Five Star Professional testimonial social post has been published!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Contact_First_Name__c}:
A new social post has been published for you! Please check out your new post online and share it directly to your network to optimize the views and interactions.
Your post can be viewed here: {!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c}
Additionally, we encourage you to share the following announcement email with your clients and network. Just copy/paste the content below into an email or other digital announcement platform to share.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out to your Client Success Representative, {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Fullname__c}, at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Phone__c} or by email at {!Fulfillment__c.Fulfillment_Owner_Email__c}.
Thank you, Five Star Professional Client Success Team
___________
{!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} are once again being praised by clients for dedication and service as {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} Five Star award winners! Check out their recent testimonial post here! If you've had a Five Star experience working with {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c}, please offer up your recognition, too!
{!Fulfillment__c.Product_Delivered_Link__c} (Copy and paste the link into your browser)
Congratulations once again to {!Fulfillment__c.Display_Team_Name__c} and all of our {!Fulfillment__c.Market_Award_Year__c} award winners!
Jonathan Wesser Five Star Professional VP, Research
